flow.doc:description: AdmssionService SOAP Web service which accepts calls and processes request to perform pre-admissions activities in the hospital's systems.
flow.name: admitPatientService

dw:transform-message.doc:name: createEpisodeResponse to admitSubjectResponse
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload:
%dw 1.0 %namespace ns0 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0 %namespace ns1 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0 %input payload application/xml %output application/xml
%var episode = payload.createEpisodeResponse.Episode --- ns0#"admitSubjectResponse": { ns1#"Episode": { episodeId: episode.episodeId, "ns1:PatientId": episode."ns1:PatientId", admission: episode.admission, (startDate: episode.startDate as :date) when episode.startDate?, (endDate: episode.endDate as :date +|P5D|) when episode.endDate?, care: episode.care }, ns1#"Bill ": { costPerNight: "100", initialStateEstimate: "5", runningTotal: "500", status: "ADMITTED" } }

sub-flow.doc:description: Uploads and inserts patient data into a hospital system.
sub-flow.name: upsertPatient

dw:transform-message.doc:name: admitSubject to upsertPatient
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload:
%dw 1.0 %namespace ns0 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0 %namespace ns1 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0 %input payload application/xml %output application/xml
%var subject = payload.Envelope.Body.admitSubject.Subject --- ns0#"upsertPatient": { ns1#"Subject": { nationalId: subject.nationalId, firstName: subject.firstName, lastName: subject.lastName, address1: subject.address1, address2: subject.address2, address3: subject.address3, nationality: subject.nationality, gender: subject.gender, (dateOfBirth: subject.dateOfBirth as :date) when subject.dateOfBirth? } }

sub-flow.doc:description: Submits calls to the PatientService Web service.
sub-flow.name: invokePatientService

sub-flow.doc:description: Creates new episodes for patient pre-admission into the hospital systems.
sub-flow.name: createEpisode

dw:transform-message.doc:name: upsertPatientResponse to createEpisode
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %namespace ns0 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0 %namespace ns1 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0 %input payload application/xml %output application/xml --- ns0#"createEpisode": { ns1#"PatientId": payload.upsertPatientResponse.ns1#PatientId }

sub-flow.doc:description: Submits calls to the EHR Web service.
sub-flow.name: invokeEHRService
